full_summary:
# Business Process Consultant (Senior) for Material Management Financial Business Transformation

**Solicitation Number**: W0152-24-AA001
**Solicitation Status**: Expired

## Tender Details
- **Publication Date**: 17 March 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: 05 April 2023 @ 2:00 PM (EST)
- **Estimated Contract Period**: 1 May 2023 to 1 November 2024

## Description of the Requirement
The Government of Canada, through the Department of National Defence, is seeking a Business Process Consultant (Senior) for Material Management Financial Business Transformation. The consultant will lead interdepartmental and departmental business process transformation activities and engage with key stakeholders and clients in the advancement of technologies and analytics.

## Scope of Work
- Provide advice and guidance to the Director, Financial Systems Integration (DFSI), the Director General, Strategic Financial Governance (DGSFG), and the Governance and Project Management Office team (GPMO) within DFSI.
- Engage with clients and stakeholders across the DND/CAF to revitalize and support innovation in financial management processes, tools, and systems.

## Security Requirements
- Company Minimum Security Level Required: Reliability
- Common SRCL #6

## Trade Agreements
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- World Trade Organization-Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP)
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

## Contact Information
- Caleb Wallace, Contracting Authority
- Email: [ADMFinn Procurement-ApprovisionnementSMAFin@forces.gc.ca](mailto:ADMFinnProcurement-ApprovisionnementSMAFin@forces.gc.ca) 

## Document Reference
- A request for proposal (RFP) [W0152-24-AA001] is available at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/17/fda7b140924269ef2bd6fd05f0c7f339/apm_w0152-24-aa001.pdf
